articles.title: Toyota beats Volkswagen to become World's No.1 car seller in 2020 - Reuters
articles.description: Japan's Toyota Motor Corp overtook Germany's Volkswagen in vehicle sales last year, regaining pole position as the world's top selling automaker for the first time in five years as the pandemic demand slump hit its German rival harder.
articles.content:
